FLAVOUR_0_INTRO.message: Avoid the inconvenience of a broken-down hyperspace engine. Get yours serviced today, by the officially endorsed {name} Engine Servicing Company.

FLAVOUR_1_INTRO.message: Is mise {proprietor}. Déanfaidh mé cothabháil ar do hipirthiomáint, agus tabharfaidh mé gealltanas duit go n-oibreoidh sé gan aon trioblóid ar feadh bliana amháin ar a laghad.

FLAVOUR_1_PRICE.message:
Is é {price} an costas chun cothabháil a dhéanamh ar do {drive}
{lasttime}

FLAVOUR_1_RESPONSE.message: Rinne mé cothabháil ar do hipirthiomáint.

FLAVOUR_2_INTRO.message:
Hi there. We at {proprietor} & Co stake our reputation on our work.
We can tune your ship's hyperdrive, ensuring 12 months of trouble-free operation.

FLAVOUR_2_PRICE.message:
{lasttime}
Mise a bheidh i mbun maoirseachta ar an obair ar do {drive}, agus dá bharr sin is féidir leat a bheith cinnte go mbeidh an obair déanta go maith, ar chostas {price}.

FLAVOUR_2_RESPONSE.message: Service complete. Thanks for your custom.

FLAVOUR_2_YESPLEASE.message: Bheinn buíoch díot dá ndéanfá cothabháil ar mo hipirthiomáint ar an bpraghas a luadh.

FLAVOUR_3_INTRO.message: Welcome SuperFix Maintenance. Time for your biannual maintenance? Let us SuperFix your hyperdrive!

FLAVOUR_3_PRICE.message:
{lasttime}
We can tune your {drive} for just {price}. There's nobody cheaper!

FLAVOUR_3_RESPONSE.message: Tá an chothabháil críochnaithe, faoi ráthaíocht na Sárdheisitheoirí!

FLAVOUR_4_INTRO.message:
Fáilte go dtí Innill Spás-Ama, Teo.

Innill idir-réaltacha an speisialtacht atá againn. Tá ár gcuid oibre cothabhála faoi ráthaíocht go ceann dhá bhliain.

FLAVOUR_4_PRICE.message:
{lasttime}
Servicing your {drive} will cost {price}. Would you like to proceed?

FLAVOUR_4_RESPONSE.message: Táimid tar éis an chothabháil ar do hipirthiomáint a chur i gcrích.

FLAVOUR_5_INTRO.message: Avoid the inconvenience of a broken-down hyperspace engine. Get yours serviced today.

I_FIXED_THE_HYPERDRIVE_BEFORE_IT_BROKE_D.message: Dheisigh mé an hipirthiomáint sular theip uirthi.

THE_SHIPS_HYPERDRIVE_HAS_BEEN_DESTROYED_.message: Scriosadh hipirthiomáint na loinge mar gheall ar mhífheidhm

YOUR_DRIVE_HAS_NOT_BEEN_SERVICED.message: Ní dhearna tú cothabháil ar do hipirthiomáint ó suiteáladh í ar {date}

YOUR_DRIVE_WAS_LAST_SERVICED_ON.message: Rinne {company} cothabháil ar do hipirthiomáint ar {date}

YOU_FIXED_THE_HYPERDRIVE_BEFORE_IT_BROKE.message: Dheisigh tú an hipirthiomáint sular theip uirthi.
